attributes.action: Geoff Wright to work at Stockton full time as static Area Manager
attributes.additional_details:
Geoff Wright to work at Stockton full time as static Area Manager.  (means he stays at stockton)

Geoff is our best friend and we gain more from having him at our store than the others do. We will allow a one day a week lease to Middlesbrough and Darlington because were nice.

Geoff will retain his position within the company although he will have to talk to us at stockton loads an all dat.

Geoff for the win!
